transcript:
This call is now being recorded.
Halo.
Halo.
Hanji boliye.
Sir namaste mai Minakshi bol rahi thi IndiaMART se sir abhi aapki meri team se baat hui thi Kohima se.
Han office se Bibu aayi hai woh.
Boliye.
Sorry.
Ji boliye mai sun raha hu aapki baat.
Ji ji sir abhi aapne uss call ke baad not satisfied ka feedback diya hai.
Han.
Han toh maine isiliye aapko call kar rahi hu ki mai abhi woh call pe thi toh mai already call pe thi woh call lekar mere pass aayi thi but meri dusri call chal rahi thi maine bola ki customer ko mai call back karti hu tab tak aapne uske call rakhne ke baad aapke pass feedback gaya hoga kyuki hum log har call pe feedback mangte hai aapse toh aapne usme not satisfied de diya isliye maine call bhi kiya sir aap yeh keh rahe the ki aapko bola gaya tha ki ek mahine ke andar aapko business mil jayega ek hafte ke andar.
Han han han.
Toh abhi jaise ki mai dekh rahi hu aapne basic jo service karai hai 1st September ko karai hai.
Ji.
Hai na?
Han.
Toh sir aapka jo IndiaMART pe jo users hai woh aapne first time karaya hai IndiaMART se aur aapka jo Ankit ji ne karaya hai aapka.
Hmm.
Ankit ji the na aapse jab payment hua tha.
Ankit ji the.
Han toh Ankit ji ke through aapne payment karaya hai aur aapke pass meri team gayi hogi aapko visit karke aapko karaya hoga Makrana Rajasthan se right?
Hmm.
Toh sir abhi aapko matlab business mein kya dikkat aa rahi hai kyuki aapka jo yaha pe mai dekh rahi hu product line woh aapka jo product hai yeh aapka aap isme retailer matlab aapka jo hai designing wala product hai aapka jo aap log usse marbleic wagera ka banate ho toh yaha pe fountains wagera hai and yeh toh sir yaha pe aapka trader as a retailer aapka business profile add hua hai toh sir aapko basically kya dikkat aa rahi hai abhi toh aapne initially start kiya hai mere platform pe toh mai aapse bas itna request kar rahi hu ki aap apna users thoda sa rakhiye itna jaldi kyuki sir aapko bhi pata hai aapka product line specific hai ek hi segment of the customer hai jo aapko karte hai follow.
Toh woh cheez hai sir.
Toh aap apna users rakhiye rest mai Ankit ko update kar rahi hu ki aapko call karke guide kare ki unhone aisa kyu bola tha ki ek hafte ke andar aapko business mil jayega toh dekhiye mere pass business hai.
Ek toh yahi toh unhone mere ko yeh baat boli thi ki aapko one week ke andar aap jo jitna invest kar rahe ho na aapko usse utna toh return mil jayega jabki aaj do mahine ho gaye.
Dekhiye aapka product size ha aapka product size jo price hai woh hamare hamare platform pe jo invest kiya hai usse jyada hi hai hai na aapka koi bhi product hoga aapne mere platform pe 32000 plus GST diya hai right lekin aapka jo product size hoga woh 40-50000 ke niche toh hoga nahi jo bhi fountain wagera aap de rahe hai woh toh mahangi aati hai.
Fountain ka ho gaya temple ka ho gaya woh member ho gaye inka portal toh receive ho rahe hai mere ko koi genuine lead toh nahi mil rahi.
Sir aapko toh aapke liye mai guide kar deti hu ki aapko genuine leads kaise milegi aapko kaise platform pe dikhega aapko kya karna hai jisse aapko aur genuine leads mil jaye toh mai woh sari cheeze aapko guide kar deti hu.
Toh thik hai aap mere mere ko hai na aaj toh kya hai abhi kal mere ko aap 4 baje ke lagbhag call back karna.
Toh sir mai na yeh jo feedback aapne diya tha na yeh mere customer care.
Nahi nahi feedback toh mera yahi rahega not satisfied wala ki mai satisfied nahi hu aap logo se maine yeh bola tha jabki Ankit ji ko ki agar mai satisfied hua aapke yaha business se mera business growth hoga toh mai mai jo apna yeh basic plan hai na isko improve kar lunga mai aur lekin jab mai satisfied hi nahi hua toh mai phir aage kya karunga.
Nahi nahi sir dekhiye mera agenda mera agenda yahi hai aapko karwane ka mai aapko dekhiye sir aapne mujhe feedback diya aapne mere ko problem bataya ab hum log aap kal bol rahe ho kal 4 baje connect karna mai aapko 4 baje aapko feedback wohi rakhiye mai nahi mana kar rahi hu feedback aapka wohi rakhiye mai kal 4 baje aapko connect karti hu mai video call pe aaungi.
Nahi nahi nahi nahi mai feedback apna yeh change nahi kar sakta.
Sir mai bilkul keh hi nahi rahi hu ki aap change kariye.
Nahi nahi nahi nahi aap logo ka kya hai aap logo ka kya hai mai aap logo ko batata hu abhi jaise mere ko complaint hai aap logo se thik hai ya toh aap log mera call receive nahi karte pehli baat toh yeh hai jab mai call karta hu.
Sir hum log na agar nahi receive karte hai sir suniye mai mai na yaha pe kaam kar rahi hu aap customer care pe call karenge na.
Maine complaint di aap logo ne feedback ke liye mere ko call kiya hai feedback ke liye baki meri jo complaint hoti hai na maine maine designing se complaint thi complaint thi toh maine Riya ji ko call kiya woh call receive nahi karte mera Ankit ji ko bola unka kuch response nahi hai aur bhi hai kin ka kin ka naam batau mai aapko yeh batau mere ko aap.
Sir dekhiye mai aapko wohi sir dekhiye aap ab aapka perception waisa bana hai mai aapko force nahi karungi bilkul nahi karungi but sir dekhiye aap aap aap aisa nahi hai ki hum aapko mere liye customer aap mere number pe bhi call karoge na agar mai nahi uthaungi na toh mere pass ek request open hokar aa jata hai ki aapne customer ko call nahi kiya hai toh woh ek external feedback ke form mein hi aata hai jaise aapne abhi feedback diya maine immediate aapko call kiya na waise agar aap mere number pe call karoge aur mai nahi uthaungi na toh mere pass feedback hi aayega sir.
Dekho mam aap mere ko kal call back karna aap mere ko ek baar batao aap mere ko satisfied kijiye phir mai aapko maine unko Ankit ji ko yeh bhi bola tha ki agar mai yaha se satisfied hua within one month jabki maine toh within one month ka bola tha thik hai mai samajhta hu chalo ID nahi hai toh time lagta hai thoda lekin aaj do do mahine ho gaye toh bhi matlab kuch achcha response nahi mil raha mere ko.
Toh sir abhi aap mujhe yeh bataiye ki kya karu sir kal connect karu kaise karu sir aapko.
Aap mere ko kal connect karna 4 baje.
Toh yeh feedback abhi aap close nahi karne doge mujhe.
Nahi nahi mai close nahi karne dunga feedback.
Thik hai no problem sir thik hai mai kal aapko 4 baje karti hu.
Okay thank you.
Have a good day.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer not satisfied with IndiaMART services.

- Promised business within a week not delivered.

- Lack of genuine leads and poor customer support.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the inconvenience.

- Executive assured to guide on lead generation.

- Executive will connect with Ankit to resolve issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back tomorrow at 4 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, customer service, buyleads, satisfaction
